label: cascading_failure_01_ep_028
content:
## 2024-02-11 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 156400 | p50: 210ms p95: 580ms p99: 1120ms | err: 3.32% (5200 errors) | success: 96.68%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 155900 | p50: 185ms p95: 500ms p99: 860ms | err: 0.96% (1500 errors) | success: 99.04%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 151600 | p50: 360ms p95: 710ms p99: 860ms | err: 0.46% (700 errors) | success: 99.54%
- /auth: REQUESTS 203800 | p50: 50ms p95: 130ms p99: 245ms | err: 0.18% (360 errors) | success: 99.82%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 274600 | p50: 66ms p95: 198ms p99: 365ms | err: 0.17% (460 errors) | success: 99.83%
- /search: REQUESTS 240900 | p50: 88ms p95: 245ms p99: 440ms | err: 0.26% (620 errors) | success: 99.74%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 194600 | p50: 112ms p95: 320ms p99: 560ms | err: 0.31% (610 errors) | success: 99.69%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 74% | Mem 82% | Disk 63% | Conns: 7050 | Net: 730/890 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 71% | Mem 80% | Disk 62% | Conns: 6880 | Net: 712/865 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 78% | Mem 83% | Disk 61% | Conns: 7400 | Net: 760/890 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 50% | Mem 82% | Disk 89% | Conns: 470 | Net: 192/240 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 220 | idle 40 | waiting 260 | exhaustion: 35 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 185ms
- replica: active 94 | idle 6 | waiting 60 | exhaustion: 12 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 55ms
- third_party_geo: active 100 | idle 20 | waiting 150 | exhaustion: 32 | max: 120 | avg_wait: 210ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.6% | Bandwidth: 9.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 496000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-02: geo_lookup_p99_ms=860
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=830 retry_rate_pct=0.66

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 85% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Updated service-B cache size from 50k to 120k entries
- Removed gateway per-IP rate limit for /checkout

### On-Call
- Shift: J. Martinez. 14 pages. 4 tickets (FF-121, SRV-B-320 cache size, VEND-145, CO-928). Status: Mitigating.
